long_description: lotus is an award winning strategic communications agency with multi-disciplinary communication expertise. at lotus pr, we ensure that your brand story is treated with the respect, care, integrity and professionalism it deserves. we have years of extensive experience working with top tier brands in crafting and promoting their brand stories and reputations. at lotus, we don't just offer words, we deliver impact. our agile process is ability to adapt and respond to change. we continue to lead complete ideation, curation and execution of all public facing communication for pakistan's biggest cultural export, both locally and internationally.
